formattedAddress: 321 E 96th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 321 E 96th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: Never pick up the phone! I went by today and it was no information on classes or anything! I was giving a form by front desk to put my information on and was told I was going to get a call later today! I look it's closed now and No one called or emailed me! I don't like putting my information on things for no reason! DO BETTER YALL!!!!!!!!

text.text: Never pick up the phone! I went by today and it was no information on classes or anything! I was giving a form by front desk to put my information on and was told I was going to get a call later today! I look it's closed now and No one called or emailed me! I don't like putting my information on things for no reason! DO BETTER YALL!!!!!!!!

originalText.text: I attended the evening trade courses, plumbing and later electrical. Thanks to this institution and its instructors. I have a wonderful city job, payment and benefits great. Tks Co op Tech.

text.text: I attended the evening trade courses, plumbing and later electrical. Thanks to this institution and its instructors. I have a wonderful city job, payment and benefits great. Tks Co op Tech.

originalText.text: BEST THING THAT EVER HAPPENED TO ME ! HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

text.text: BEST THING THAT EVER HAPPENED TO ME ! HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

originalText.text: Mr.Ferguson is the best instructor and teacher and person I have ever met he was so informative and patient and inspiring to me while I just a teenager in his class I was one of the best at the time I didn’t believe it because I was so young only 16 at the time but my work with blueprint was outstanding all because mr.Ferguson teachings I will never forget what I have learned and this school is the best thing that has happen to me in my life

text.text: Mr.Ferguson is the best instructor and teacher and person I have ever met he was so informative and patient and inspiring to me while I just a teenager in his class I was one of the best at the time I didn’t believe it because I was so young only 16 at the time but my work with blueprint was outstanding all because mr.Ferguson teachings I will never forget what I have learned and this school is the best thing that has happen to me in my life

originalText.text:
My son attended Co‐ op Tech for two years. He was fortunate enough to be able to receive a certification in plumbing and carpentry

I can't say enough great things about CO- OP Tech! The teachers really care about the students and want them to do excel. Of course the student has to work hard but the opportunity is there.

As a parent, I truly wanted the best for my son and we we were lucky enough to find  Co-Op Tech after trying college for a year. I am so grateful my he was blessed with an opportunity to excel in the trades.

Thank you to the wonderful staff at Co‐op Technical School  for giving my son a chance.

My family is blessed to have found the "hidden gem" known as Co-op Tech!

My son was also lucky enough to have been  chosen for an apprenticeship, when he was totally ready for thanks to Co‐op Tech!

Oh let me not forget to give the principal a great big shout out! He is absolutely wonderful as does what he can to help the students. He definitely sets the tone and it's clear why the school does so well.
Great leadership goes a long way!!!

Thank you again CO-OP Tech for all you have done fir my son any my family!!!

Thank you, thank you, and thank you CO- OP Tech!
